div.head: Poem:
div.p: Charles-Hubert Millevoye (1782–1816), La Fauvette in Poésies Légères. Œuvres complètes, 3e éd., 1827, tome I, p. 282–23. The poem is not called Vieille Chanson.

div.head: Composition:
div.p: by 1865, when it was published. The autographs suggest it was originally presented as the work of another. Gaston de Betzi was Bizet’s occasional pseudonym (see Hymne à la paix).

div.head: Dedicatee:
div.p: Caroline Miolan-Carvalho (1827–95), leading soprano during the Second Empire and wife of Léon Carvalho, director of the Théâtre-Lyrique. In 1867 she created the role of Juliette in Gounod’s Roméo et Juliette.
